title: Lessen the penalty for dodging, seriously
body:
Dodging should not be a loss in promo series.

I can understand the timeout for dodging.
I can understand the 3 LP loss for dodging.
But I can't grasp the understand of an instant loss in your series. We didn't play a match to even consider a win or a loss, how is that reasonable.

And on top of that, when you're in champ select and you see "mid or feed" or 2 adc because of lack of communication... we have to suffer a loss to not waste 20 min to deal with that.

Seriously, remove the loss in promo from dodging.
